text:
Ayaz Jani (original name Ayaz Hussain Memon) (, born 4 October 1967 – died 6 June 2016) was a Pakistani poet and journalist. He wrote in the Sindhi language. Jani had been writing poetry since his school days and gained popularity as a romantic poet.
Jani died on 6 June 2016 due to a heart attack in Larkana, Pakistan, aged 48.
